ygData.subject: Hi
ygData.msgSnippet: Just wanted to say hello to everyone, i have a 6th level wizard on Errolis Marr.  I currently play with my online friend that i am close to and our characters
ygData.messageBody:
Just wanted to say hello to everyone, i have a 6th level wizard on
Errolis Marr. I currently play with my online friend that i am close to
and our characters are involved as lovers, we are suppose to be role
playing a dinner meeting with another couple this weekend ... cant wait
for that. Oh My characters name is Elarien, so if You happen to run
across me please say hello. I have found it very easy to make friends
with the men of EQ but i have met few *supose to be ladies* that have
not only been rude but just plain not nice. I was very happy when my
boyfriend found the list and sent me an email bout it. Look forward to
meeting some of You.

Take Care,
Ela
